verses.text: Ix in k'exxi k'elan, ix wilani to ay jun winh winak ed'jinac jun ch'anh cuerda.
Ix in k'anb'an t'a winh: ¿B'ajtil tzach b'ati? xin chi. Ix yalan winh t'ayin icha tik: Van in b'at wechtej chonhab' Jerusalén, yic snachajeli jantac sk'atul yet' jantac sat, xchi winh.
Yuj chi', ix wilan sb'at jun ángel wan slolon chi' wed'oc. Ay junxo ángel chi' ix elta ul scha'a, ha' ix alan t'ay:

Ixic t'a elanhchamel, al t'a winh quelem chi' icha tik: Ha Jerusalén, manhxo ol yal-laj yoch smuroal, yujto a heb' anima ol kajnajxoc t'ay, manhxo jantacoc ol aj sb'isul heb'. Ol te q'uib'paxchaanh nok' smolb'etzal nok' heb'.
Palta a Jehová tz'alani: Ha in ol in och oyan t'a spatictac Jerusalén chi' icha junok k'ak', icha muro. Ol in ch'ox in tziquiquial t'a skal chonhab' chi', xchi Jehová, xa chi, xchi jun ángel chi'.

Ha Jehová tz'alan icha tik: Ha in ix ex wak' saclemb'at t'a masanil yol yib'anhk’inal. Palta a ticnaik, swal t'ayex icha tik: Ex aj Sion, elanheccot elanhchamel t'a Babilonia ay t'a stojolal norte b'aj sacleminac eyajkanb'ati, xchi Jehová.

Ha Jehová Yajal t'a Smasanil, schekan wal juntzanh lolonel tik t'a juntzanh nación ix ex pechan saclem a ex schonhab' ex tik. Ha tz'alan icha tik: Yalnhej mach tz'ixtan in chonhab' tik, ichato a snenal yol in sat syixtej. Yuj chi' a in ol wak' owal yet' juntzanh nación chi', a in ol in chec heb' ayoch schekab'oc heb' yic a heb' ol ik'anek' jantac sb'eyumal heb', xchi Jehová. Icha chi' ol aj sch'oxan sb'a stziquiquial Jehová, icha pax chi' ol aj snachajel eyuuj to ha' ix in chekancot wal t'ayex.
Ha Jehová tz'alan icha tik: B'itananhec t'a tzalajk'olal ex aj Sion, yujto ol in k'ochoc, ol in kajnaj t'a he kal, xchi Jehová.

Ayic ol ujok jun tik, tzijtum nación ol jawok t'a Jehová, ol och schonhab'oc. Ol kajnajnhej Jehová chi' t'a he kal. Icha chi' ol aj snachajel eyuuj to a Jehová Yajal t'a Smasanil ix in chekancot t'ayex.
Ha Jehová, ol yak' checlaj t'a sat lum lum yictaxoni to a Judá yico', haxo pax Jerusalén sik'b'ilel yuj.
Numk'ajokab' masanil anima t'a yol yib'anhk’inal t'a yichanh Jehová, yujto wan scot yuj heb' schonhab', wan yelta t'a yol skajnub' yicnhej yaji.
